mapper.select: SELECT w.well_id, w.well_name, w.well_factory, i.indicator_id, i.indicator_name, i.indicator_unit, YEAR(r.record_time) AS the_year, MONTH(r.record_time) AS mon, AVG(r.record_value) AS mon_avg FROM record r JOIN indicator i ON r.indicator_id = i.indicator_id JOIN well w ON r.well_id = w.well_id WHERE YEAR(r.record_time) =#{year} AND r.indicator_id = #{indicatorId} AND w.well_factory=#{factory} GROUP BY w.well_id, w.well_name, w.well_factory, i.indicator_id, i.indicator_name, i.indicator_unit, YEAR(r.record_time), MONTH(r.record_time) LIMIT ${(current-1)*size},${size}
